home.whatIDo: developing web, desktop, and mobile apps!
home.offerService: Need a web page or app? Get in touch and bring your ideas to life.

about.title: About me
about.niceToMeetYou: NICE TO MEET YOU, I'M TOM√Å≈†
about.iAm: I'm a web developer based in Czechia, specializing in front-end web and app development. With a passion for creating intuitive user experiences, I strive to bring ideas to life through clean and efficient code.
about.designText: I lean towards minimalistic web design but enjoy exploring new concepts and styles. My design approach is enhanced by using tools like Figma, Ant Design, and Color Hunt.
about.webDevText1: I specialize in front-end development using React JS and HTML, complemented by Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap for styling. My preferred database is MySQL, and I'm actively learning Amazon Web Services (AWS) solutions for hosting and scalability.
about.webDevText2: I also enjoy exploring emerging technologies such as Gluestack and stay updated with the latest tools and frameworks.
about.mobileDevText: For mobile app development, my focus lies in utilizing React Native to build robust applications for both Android and iOS platforms. Additionally, I employ MAUI with Blazor for seamless cross-platform development.
